thread.section_title: Oak Motors Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Oak Motors | www.oakmotors.com
thread.title: TIA BARNETT
thread.title_full: Oak Motors reviewed by TIA BARNETT

author: TIA BARNETT
title: TIA BARNETT
text: I came to Oak Motors discouraged and dejected after being turned down by JD Byrider, especially since I had done business with JD in the past and had an excellent payment history. When I arrived I was treated with respect, kindness and most of all they were willing to really help me! I got a vehicle that I REALLY LOVE!! and the process was super easy. I will surely recommend their services to EVERYONE I KNOW!!!! JD BYRIDER, your nasty representatives and you lack of loyalty to a customer whom you KNOW paid on time has just lost your a Customer FOR LIFE!!!!
